title: Riot employee join me for a game, 1000 normal wins!
body:
Hey,

I'm currently on 1023 normal wins and was hoping a RIOT employee would play a game with me to celebrate reaching 1000!

My username is Bizkut

Would love to play with one of you :D
Feel free to add me in game when you have time!

Thanks
Bizkut

replies.body:
I once played with Agent Mindstar, before I knew he was riot.... stole kill as lee... no regrets :D - Agent Minstar was kewl with it, very friendly, want to play more ヽ(ｏ ⌣ ｏ)ﾉ, but always busy now (◕‸◕)

- can I play (◕  ⌣  ◕)
